name: 鸿门一宴(Malicious Dinner)_中英
description:
Malicious Dinner is an AVG story game which ur decision will promote the development of polts. Player is a girl student who were invited to a volunteer-reward activem, only to find it's actually a mailcious dinner. How to survive from a it?

When u r toasted, drink or reject?
When u r framed, stay or hide?
When u r harassed, hesitate or refuse?
When u r abused, keep quiet or fight against?

Including 4 Casual games, 5 careers, 6 Results. NowU r just a student. Can choose more different status, play more stories and unlock more results later.
=======================================================
★Please make wise choices. Different decisions will aslo increase or decrease ur vaule, lead to different results and totally influence how much effective evdiences u got in the lawsuit.

★click the top left button of start menu can switch Chinese/English language.

★This game is made of Evkworld game engineer↓↓↓
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1099400/_Evkworld/
